mapper.sql: person_id, person_name, phone_num, id_num, province, city, area, address, data_status, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark, alias, sex
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM m_person WHERE data_status = 1 AND (phone_num = #{phoneNumOrName} OR person_name like CONCAT('%', #{phoneNumOrName}, '%'))

SELECT * FROM m_person WHERE data_status = 1
AND phone_num like CONCAT('%', #{phoneNum}, '%')
AND person_name like CONCAT('%', #{personName}, '%')

SELECT address, create_time FROM (SELECT address, create_time, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY address ORDER BY create_time DESC) AS rn FROM (SELECT address, create_time FROM t_corn_cob_purchase tccp WHERE tccp.seller_id = #{personId} AND address IS NOT NULL AND address != '' UNION SELECT address, create_time FROM t_corn_grain_purchase tcgp WHERE tcgp.seller_id = #{personId} AND address IS NOT NULL AND address != '' ) AS merged_table ) AS ranked_table WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC;

SELECT mp.*, sac.area_name AS province_name, sac2.area_name AS city_name, sac3.area_name AS area_name FROM m_person mp LEFT JOIN s_area_code sac ON mp.province = sac.area_code AND sac.area_lv = 1 LEFT JOIN s_area_code sac2 ON mp.city = sac2.area_code AND sac2.area_lv = 2 LEFT JOIN s_area_code sac3 ON mp.area = sac3.area_code AND sac3.area_lv = 3 WHERE mp.data_status = '1'
AND ( mp.person_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{personName}, '%') OR mp.alias LIKE CONCAT('%', #{personName}, '%') )
AND mp.phone_num LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phoneNum}, '%')
AND mp.id_num = #{idNum}
AND mp.address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%')
ORDER BY mp.create_time DESC

SELECT * FROM m_person WHERE data_status = '1'
AND id_num = #{idNum}

SELECT mp.* FROM m_person mp WHERE mp.data_status = '1' AND mp.person_id NOT IN ( SELECT mw.person_id FROM m_worker mw WHERE mw.data_status = '1' )
AND ( mp.person_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{personName}, '%') OR mp.alias LIKE CONCAT('%', #{personName}, '%') )
AND mp.phone_num LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phoneNum}, '%')
AND mp.id_num = #{idNum}
AND mp.address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%')
ORDER BY mp.create_time DESC
